title: EV Charging Dashboard Platform
description: Developed comprehensive dashboard application using Material UI in Next.js from scratch, providing real-time performance analytics for charging sites with advanced data visualization using Recharts.

title: EV Charging Mobile App
description: Maintained and enhanced iOS and Android mobile application using React Native and GraphQL, implementing features like food coupon integration for charging sessions to drive station footfall and user engagement.

title: Multi-Client Payment System
description: Led implementation of Stripe Payments with Connected Accounts feature for multiple clients, ensuring seamless, secure, and scalable payment processing across the platform.

title: Solar Panel Design System
description: Developed complex solar panel design tool using Google Maps API and Drawing Library, solving intricate geospatial challenges. Migrated from plain JavaScript to Angular 6 with RxJS state management.

title: AWS Serverless Workflow System
description: Built complex serverless workflows using AWS Step Functions, State Machine, Lambda, S3, and SQS to solve challenging problem statements with high scalability and reliability.

title: eLearning Platform with xAPI
description: Developed complete learning system platform using MariaDB and Node.js backend. Integrated Tincan API/xAPI with open source LRS, leading a team of 5 members to deliver full end-to-end solution.

title: Youth Social Networking Platform
description: Developed backend for youth social networking site using Node.js and Restify. Implemented Neo4j graph database to maintain complex multi-directional relationships between entities.

title: Gmail Management Chrome Extension
description: Developed Chrome Extension for better Gmail management in pre-AI/ML era, improving workflow efficiency and user productivity with innovative features.

title: Multi-Tenant SaaS Platform
description: Architected and managed high-scalability multi-tenant product with custom policies, advanced security measures, and comprehensive monitoring systems at Aptara Inc.

title: Kids Social Networking Platform
description: Single-handedly developed frontend for kids' social networking platform using Adobe Flex and ActionScript 3.0. Built Admin Portal and successfully migrated from Flex 4 to Flex 4.5.
